name: signalk-pebble-mydata
description: A signalk node plugin to show boat data on Pebble smartwatch
readme: # signalk-pebble-mydata[![Greenkeeper badge](https://badges.greenkeeper.io/joabakk/signalk-pebble-mydata.svg)](https://greenkeeper.io/)A Signal K plugin (for signalk-server-node) to send selected data to a generated json which can be adressed by the https://github.com/bahbka/pebble-my-data app
